travelAgencyModel

Class TravelAgency

  • java.lang.Object
    • travelAgencyModel.TravelAgency
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TravelAgency
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Gateway class for the underlying model. Implements the Serializable pattern for file persistence.
    Author:
    DVN, Carlos, Afonso
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setFrequentCustomerThreshhold

        public void setFrequentCustomerThreshhold(int reservationCount)
        Sets the frequent customer threshhold, which determines when a customer is applicable to receive a discount specified by the defaultDiscountRate.
        Parameters:
        reservationCount - The amount of reservations needed to be applicable for a automatic discount

      • listAvailableBusses

        public Bus[] listAvailableBusses(java.time.LocalDateTime startDate,
                                 java.time.LocalDateTime endDate,
                                 int minCapacity)
        Lists the Buses that are available within the specified time period, which has a capacity equal to or exceeding minCapacity.
        Parameters:
        startDate - The start of the time interval.
        endDate - The end of the time interval.
        minCapacity - The minimum Passenger capacity that the returned buses must have.
        Returns:
        A collection of Buses that satisfies the conditions.

        Parameters:
        startDate - The start of the time interval.
        endDate - The end of the time interval.
        Returns:
        A collection of Chauffeurs that satisfies the conditions.

      • setDefaultDiscountRate

        public void setDefaultDiscountRate(double rate)
        Sets the default discount rate that will be applied whenever a customer exceeds the frequentCustomerThreshHold.
        Parameters:
        rate - The discount rate to be applied.

      • getCustomer

        public Customer getCustomer(java.lang.String name,
                            int phoneNumber)
        Returns the first Customer in the underlying collection whose name and phoneNumber is equal to the provided arguments.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to look for.
        phoneNumber - The phone number to look for
        Returns:
        Returns the first instance of Customer that satisfies the condition if any, otherwise returns null.

      • isFrequentCustomer

        public boolean isFrequentCustomer(Customer customer)
        Determines whether the specified Customers all-time reservation count exceeds the frequentCustomerThreshHold.
        Parameters:
        customer - The Customer to check.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Customer exceeds the frequentCustomerThreshHold.

      • getCustomerSuggestedPrice

        public double getCustomerSuggestedPrice(double basePrice,
                                        Customer payingCustomer)
        Returns the suggested price for a given Customer given a specific base price. The given base price is returned as-is if the Customer is not applicable to a discount.
        Parameters:
        basePrice - The base price.
        payingCustomer - The Customer to be assessed for a discount.
        Returns:
        Returns the given basePrice if the given Customer is not applicable for a discount. Otherwise returns a new price with a discount deducted.

      • getCustomerSuggestedPrice

        public double getCustomerSuggestedPrice(Travel travel,
                                        Customer payingCustomer)
        Returns the suggested price for a given Customer given a specific Travel. The base price of the Travel is returned as-is if the Customer is not applicable to a discount.
        Parameters:
        travel - The Travel from which the base price is determined.
        payingCustomer - The Customer to be assessed for a discount.
        Returns:
        Returns the base price of the given Travel if the given Customer is not applicable for a discount. Otherwise returns a new price with a discount deducted.

      • addBus

        public void addBus(java.lang.String make,
                   java.lang.String model,
                   java.lang.String licensePlate,
                   int maxCapacity)
        Adds a new bus with the specified parameters to the underlying collection, and saves the collection to the hard drive.
        Parameters:
        make - The manufacturer of the bus.
        model - The model name of the bus.
        licensePlate - The vehicle license plate.
        maxCapacity - The maximum passenger capacity of this bus.

        public void deleteBus(Bus bus)

      • searchTravel

        public Travel[] searchTravel(java.lang.String destination,
                             Chauffeur chauffeur,
                             Bus bus)
        Searches for Travels that satisfies the given input parameters. If any of the passed parameters are null, they are ignored, in which case they do not affect the search result. Does exclusive search by default.
        Parameters:
        destination - A destination that is searched for in the Travels destinations collection.
        chauffeur - A Chauffeur that is searched for.
        bus - A Bus that is searched Bus.
        inclusive - Specifies whether the search should be done inclusive or exclusive.
        Returns:
        A collection of Travels that matches the search parameters.

      • searchBus

        public Bus[] searchBus(java.lang.String make,
                       java.lang.String model,
                       java.lang.String licensePlate,
                       int maxCapacity)
        Searches for Buses that satisfies the given input parameters. Does exclusive search by default.If any of the passed parameters are null, they are ignored, in which case they do not affect the search result.
        Parameters:
        make - The manufacturer to search for.
        model - The vehicle model to search for.
        licensePlate - The vehicle license plate to search for.
        maxCapacity - The vehicle maximum passenger capacity to search for.
        Returns:
        Returns an array of Buses that satisfies the given parameters.

      • searchChauffeur

        public Chauffeur[] searchChauffeur(java.lang.String firstName,
                                   java.lang.String lastName,
                                   int chauffeurID)
        Searches for Chauffeurs that satisfies the given input parameters. Does exclusive search by default. If any of the passed parameters are null, they are ignored, in which case they do not affect the search result.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The fist name to search for.
        lastName - The last name to search for.
        chauffeurID - The chauffeur ID to search for.
        Returns:
        Returns an array of Chauffeures that satisfies the given parameters.
